ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I highly recommend this course to a fellow student who wishes to improve his/her academic writing. One will get to learn many skills and will be a better academic writer.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Before attending this course I had a raw understanding of academic writing but now I have attained a good understanding of this course. Since I am a Ph.D. research scholar in India, this course has really helped me write better and better. So I want to thank Professor James for teaching me so many new and old methodologies to write academically.
